title: Tomorrow's F1 starting grid for the 2025 Canadian Grand Prix
summary: George Russell will start on pole for the 2025 Canadian Grand Prix. Here's how the starting grid — with only 19 drivers — looks for Sunday's race in Montreal

qa_pairs.question: Who secured the pole position for the 2025 Canadian Grand Prix?
How many drivers will compete in the 2025 Canadian Grand Prix starting grid?
In which city is the 2025 Canadian Grand Prix taking place?
